column2: FCC rejects T-Mobile request to limit spectrum for AT&T;
column3: Verizon The U.S. Federal Communications Commission on Thursday denied T-Mobile US Inc's request that more airwaves be set aside for smaller wireless companies like itself to bid on during a government auction next year.

column2: Soccer-FIFA sponsor McDonald's backs independent reform body-group ZURICH
column3: Aug 6 World Cup sponsor McDonald's  has joined Coca-Cola and Visa in urging FIFA to adopt an independent reform commission in response to the scandals that have plagued world football's governing body.
